assignments.label: Assign values in Case record Variable

decisions.name: Check_if_Createdby_is_End_User
decisions.label: Check if Createdby is End User

rules.name: If_End_User_is_Standard_Platform_User
rules.label: If End User is Standard Platform User

Flow.description: Delegation update Brand update MX office Delegation Before removing category lookup

formulas.name: varDescription
formulas.expression:
"Name: " + {!varTermedPerson} + "
" + "Time: " + TEXT({!Date_and_time_Screen}) + "
" + IF ({!Region1} == 'EMEA', {!varDescriptionEMEA} , "") + IF ({!Region1} == 'Mexico', {!varDescriptionMX} , "") + IF ({!Region1} == 'USA', {!varDescriptionUSA}, "") + "
" + "Phone: " + {!Phone_Screen.value} + "
" + "Email: " + {!ContactEmail.value} +"
" + IF (ISBLANK({!Forward_Emails}),"","Forward Emails to: " + {!Forward_Emails} +"
") + IF (ISBLANK({!Delegate_Mailbox}),"","Delegate Mailbox to: " + {!Delegate_Mailbox} +"
") + IF (ISBLANK({!Direct_Reports}),"","Move Direct Reports to: " + {!Direct_Reports} +"
") + IF (ISBLANK({!One_Drive}),"","Move One Drive to: " + {!One_Drive} +"
") + IF (ISBLANK({!Additional_Information_Screen}),"","Addition Information: " + {!Additional_Information_Screen})

formulas.name: varDescriptionMX
formulas.expression:
IF ({!Laptop_Return_MX_Screen} == 'Return Shipping Label', "Address Details:
" + "Address:
" + "Street: " + {!Street_Address_Screen} + "City: " + {!City_Screen} + "Postal Code: " + {!Postal_Code_Screen} + "State: " + {!State_Screen} , "Office Return:" + {!Return_Location_MX} + "
")

recordCreates.name: Create_Share_Record_with_Created_by_End_User

fields.name: Massage
fields.fieldText: Termination Case Number# {!Get_New_Case.CaseNumber} has been created.

fields.name: error
fields.fieldText: The Incident was not created. Please contact your Salesforce system administrator.

fields.name: User_Not_Found_Checkbox_Screen
fields.fieldText: Click here if Termed Person is not found in search box.

fields.name: Forward_Display
fields.fieldText: Email Forward will forward emails of the terminated employee to the requested email address(es).

fields.name: Delegate_Display
fields.fieldText: Delegating a mailbox will allow the user(s) to login to the terminated user's mailbox.
